original_title: Kanye With Special Guest Drake - Free Larry Hoover Benefit Concert
overview: Watch music and cultural icon, Kanye, in his first headlining show in five years, with special guest Drake, live from the Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum. Kanye has dedicated the benefit concert to raising awareness of the need for prison and sentencing reform, and supporting legal reform and community advocates.
title: Kanye With Special Guest Drake - Free Larry Hoover Benefit Concert
